text: is a 1970 Japanese film directed by Kazuo Ikehiro. It is based on Jun'ichirō Tanizaki's novel Kyōfu Jidai. All the characters in the film are villains. Kazuo Ikehiro considers the film is one of the best his own films.本当に面白い時代劇 1945-2015 メディアックス 170-171ページ ==Plot== In Shunto's(daimyo) residence, Ogin gets a poison from daimyo's doctor, she plans to poison Shunto's wife by Chinsai's help. But Chinsai talks it to his younger sister Oyui. Oyui tries to seize the proof to get money. But she is killed by Umeno. The evil woman Ogin involves various people. ==Cast== * Michiyo Yasuda as Ogin no Kata * Masakazu Tamura as Isogai Iori * Shin Kishida as Tayu * Kei Satō as Shunto (Daimyo) * Akiko Koyama as Umeno * Kogan Ashiya as Chinsai (Monk) * Natsuko Oka as Oyui * Rinichi Yamamoto as Akaza Matajūrō * Hoshei Komatsu as Hosoi Gentaku ==References== ==External links== Category:Japanese films Category:Jidaigeki films Category:Samurai films Category:Daiei Film films
title: Onna Gokuakuchō
